# NatureCode Repository

### ðŸ“‹ **Essential Documentation**

1. **[whatisthis](whatisthis)** - **Complete project documentation** with changelog, current status, and technical details

3. **[AGENTS.md](AGENTS.md)** - Development guidelines and commands

### ðŸš€ **Quick Start**

```bash
# One-line installation
curl -fsSL https://raw.githubusercontent.com/naturecode-official/naturecode/main/install.sh | bash

# Configure AI provider
naturecode model

# Start interactive session
naturecode start
```
